pkgmetadata.longdescription: Phylogenetic ANalyses of DiversificAtion // Implements macroevolutionary analyses on phylogenetic trees. See Morlon et al. PLoSB (2010), Morlon et al. PNAS (2011), Condamine et al. Eco Lett (2013), Morlon et al. Eco Lett (2014), Manceau et al. (2015) and Lewitus Morlon (submitted).
